**Example 1: 源账号登录**



Input: 

```
tccli lcic LoginOriginId --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --SdkAppId 1234657 \
    --OriginId useMPoL
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "UserId": "2CvDgjRNjylAsBZB4iZc0F6koXe",
        "Token": "3o32r0j134m13aa0uva0jvj90qj4j004198",
        "RequestId": "e574aae1-lp02-4225-a2f8-9032h7199f5f0"
    }
}
```
